snippet: Sports photographers who shoot underwater spend an extended time at the bottom of the pool, hoping to capture Olympic history.
abstract: Many sports photographers who shoot underwater are certified scuba divers, giving them the comfort of extended time underwater to perfect the art of capturing the world's best swimmers from below; Al Bello, who is covering his ninth Olympics, says it is harder to produce something special now that more cameras are in the pool.
lead_paragraph: Sports photographers who shoot underwater spend an extended time at the bottom of the pool, hoping to capture Olympic history.

headline.seo: How Swimming Photographers Make Their Underwater Moment
headline.main: To Get the Shot, Nerve, Luck and Scuba Gear
